--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Hot Rod is in his room in the Alliance base. He had been 
talking to
> Feline, and do to reprograming she didn't know who he was. He put a 
note
> under her door that said: I love you. I'm going back to the 
Maximals.
> I'll be back for you. Blah Blah Blah. He also put one of his medals 
with
> the note for her to have for the hell of it.(Think Navy 'wings' but 
with
> an Autobot symbol in the center. He couldn't get out of the base do 
to
> the lockdown, so he is waiting in his room, to get out.
